node.title: Police seek witnesses to serious assault in Lower Hutt
node.description: It took place early on Saturday morning in the Lower Hutt suburb of Moera.
node.content: ["Police are asking for any witnesses of a serious assault that took place in Wellington to come forward.\u00a0", "They responded to an incident at 2:15am on Saturday in the Lower Hutt suburb of Moera.", "Det Snr Sgt Martin Todd said five or six people were fighting on Trevethick Grove.", "\"On arrival, one man was located unconscious and had lost a lot of blood,\" Todd said.\u00a0", "The man received medical treatment and does not have life-threatening injuries.", "An 18-year-old man was taken to Hutt Hospital by his friends with critical injuries. He underwent emergency surgery and is currently in Wellington Hospital.", "Police said initial enquiries indicate there was a party at a Trevethick Grove address the men had attended prior to being assaulted.", "Police are looking for any witnesses and would like to speak to anyone who attended the party or any members of the public who were in the vicinity of Trevethick Grove, Whites Line West and Ludlam Cres, Lower Hutt at around 2:15am.", "\"We are also asking that residents of this area check their properties for any items that do not belong to them and that may have been involved in this offending,\" Todd said.\u00a0", "A scene examination is continuing at Trevethick Grove on Saturday.", "Anyone with information that could assist police should call 105 and quote file number 211218/4047.", "Information can also be passed on anonymously by contacting Crime Stoppers on 0800 555 111."]
